I would highly recommend making your own vanilla extract as it tastes so much better than most store bought extracts. To make it just buy some whole vanilla beans and put them in a bottle full of plain vodka and let it soak. It will take a couple weeks before the vanilla flavor gets strong enough to use but once its ready just use it with the beans in the bottle. If it ever gets low just add some more vodka and I would suggest replacing the vanilla beans every 2-3 years.
